description: This header defines functions related to timed wait operations using pthread condition variables, including initialization and various timed wait methods with seconds, milliseconds, and nanoseconds granularity.

methods.name: initTimedWaitCond
methods.description: Initializes a pthread condition variable for timed waits.

methods.name: incrementalCondTimedWait
methods.description: Performs a timed wait on a condition variable based on the monotonic clock, with timeout specified in seconds.

methods.name: incrementalCondTimedWaitMillis
methods.description: Performs a timed wait based on milliseconds.

methods.name: granularIncrementalCondTimedWait
methods.description: Performs a highly granular timed wait using a timespec, allowing nanosecond precision.
